title: Breakingviews TV: Tesla glitch
text:
Breakingviews TV: Tesla glitch Thursday, May 03, 2018 - 04:52
Antony Currie and Richard Beales talk about Tesla’s biggest-ever quarterly loss, the electric-car maker’s ambitions, and boss Elon Musk’s impatience with Wall Street analysts on the company’s earnings call – and what that means for its capital-raising prospects.
Antony Currie and Richard Beales talk about Tesla’s biggest-ever quarterly loss, the electric-car maker’s ambitions, and boss Elon Musk’s impatience with Wall Street analysts on the company’s earnings call – and what that means for its capital-raising prospects. //reut.rs/2KB7JRs
